Tap Supermarket is a HTML5 game where you own your own market and become rich by making the best out of it, keep on expending for the new departments to increase rating of your supermarket.


How To Play:
1) Tap restock icon to restock items and store room.
2) Tap cash register to speed up waiting lines.
3) Keep growing and expend new departments to reach 5 stars rating.
